title: Incredible Places to Stay
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 288 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 560L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and P
description: Have you ever visited a hotel made out of ice? How about a hotel located underwater? Incredible Places to Stay explores these and many other fascinating hotels around the world. Photographs of these unique places help further engage students with this interesting topic. Students will also have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge, as well as to compare and contrast to better understand the text. The book and lesson are also available for levels M and P.
reviewWords: blends, hotels, incredible, melts, mine, tour
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast information in a text
grammar: Proper Nouns                : Recognize and use proper nouns that name places
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Identify and arrange words in alphabetical order
